revised_title: Safety and Benefits of Oral Contraceptives: A Discussion on Contraceptives of the Future
tldr: This article discusses the safety and benefits of oral contraceptives, also known as "the pill." It evaluates existing techniques and compares them to other methods like intrauterine devices and diaphragms. The author concludes that the medical and social benefits of using oral contraceptives outweigh the risks, and that "the pill" can continue to be used.
